text: Disco Zombies were a UK punk band of the late 1970s.Kellman, Andy. Disco Zombies biography at AllMusic. Retrieved 24 January 2015.Gardner, Noel (7 October 2011). "Album Review: Disco Zombies – Drums over London", Drowned in Sound. Retrieved 24 January 2015. One of the better known songs was "Drums over London" (1979).Pete Frame's Rocking Around Britain 1999 George Gimarc Punk Diary The Ultimate Trainspotters Guide 2005 p.192"Disco Zombies – "Drums over London" 7"", Killed by Death Records.
